title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.35 - Unlicensed activity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.35 - Unlicensed activity

State Regulations
(a) No person shall conduct research, instructional activities or chemical analysis of controlled substances in this State without first having obtained a license from the department. (b) Licensees. Licensees shall register with the appropriate Federal agency or agencies in the comparable controlled substance schedule provided for under Federal regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10

80.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
